Data Classifications  Definitions  Overview      ACCC Information Security and Privacy Office    Overview    The mission of the ACCC Information Security and Privacy Office is to protect the UIC community from active and potential security threats.    Efforts     Monitor the health and security of the campus network  Research and advise on current security threats  Assist with the creation of and compliance with University security policy  Ensure compliance with IT legal and regulatory requirements  Security awareness and training   Stay informed!  We are working to bring you informative and engaging content on our website. For now please considering following us on Twitter.  For Security Education, Awareness and News.  Follow @ACCCSecurity             NCSAM National Cyber Security Awareness Month highlights a specific threat each week to raise awareness for cyber security in the UIC community.
